boardgame.name: Mysterium
Il Sesto Senso
Tajemnicze Domostwo
Анна-Детективъ. Мистериум
Містеріум
Мистериум
boardgame.description: Tajemnicze Domostwo is a purely co-operative game for 2-7 players. One player takes the role of a helpful ghost who lives in a mysterious ancient manor. Other players are a group of psychics invited by the manor owner to solve the mystery of the place and bring peace to its residents, as any person who stays in the castle sees strange dreams._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The ancient legend says the ghost is the soul of the manor's previous resident, who was unjustly executed for a crime he didn't commit, more than one hundred years ago. Now he tries to use the mysterious signs to tell people the truth about what really happened then, so that justice would be established and he might rest in peace for ever. The specialists in the supernatural were invited to try to understand what the ghost wants to tell and in case of success be honored by one more victory and receive a generous reward. They have seven days and seven nights to reach their goal. If they succeed in time, everyone wins the game (including the ghost)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Tajemnicze Domostwo (Mysterium) - Original Polish version - English rules included We have 1 in stock. The box is slightly damaged and has been opened, but contains all playing pieces and cards. Never been played, so aside from the damaged box, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s like new. The inside is slightly damaged too. Please see pictures.
This is a co-operative game for 2-7 players. One player takes the role of a helpful ghost who lives in a mysterious ancient manor. Other players are a group of psychics invited by the manor owner to solve the mystery of the place and bring peace to its residents, as any person who stays in the castle sees strange dreams. The ancient legend says the ghost is the soul of the manor_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s previous resident, who was unjustly executed for a crime he didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t commit, more than 100 years ago. Now he tries to use the mysterious signs to tell people the truth about what really happened then, so that justice would be established and he might rest in peace forever. The specialists in the supernatural were invited to try to understand what the ghost wants to tell and in case of success be honored by one more victory and receive a generous reward. They have 7 days and 7 nights to reach their goal. If they succeed in time, everyone wins the game (including the ghost).
Components 84 Dream Cards 19 Character Cards (Investigator) 19 Location Cards (Investigator) 20 Item Cards (Investigator) 19 Character Cards (Spirit) 19 Location Cards (Spirit) 19 Item Cards (Spirit) 1 Calendar Board 1 Round Marker 6 Investigator Boards 6 Investigation Progress Tokens 12 Investigator Markers
